item.title: The Beginning
item.description: I sincerely hope that this Hugo website is–finally–the beginning of the blog I’ve been searching for a long time. Every year or so ‘I feel it’s time’, but I’m am always detained by the boredom of the existing technology: neither I want to use log-in solutions such as Wordpress, nor I want to spend years writing html code, just to communicate a simple thought. Knots and the name of this blog… Before becoming a PhD student, I spent a some time thinking about geometry and knots.
